mapper.update: CREATE TABLE team_member_#{teamId} ( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, user_join_date DATETIME NOT NULL, team_manager BIGINT NOT NULL, users_id BIGINT NOT NULL, team_id BIGINT NOT NULL );
mapper.select: SELECT id as id, user_join_date as userJoinDate, team_manager as teamManager, users_id as userId, team_id as teamId FROM team_member_#{teamId} WHERE team_id = #{teamId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team_member_#{teamId} (user_join_date, team_manager, team_id, users_id) VALUES (now(), #{teamManager}, #{teamId}, #{userId})
